content: st of the bottom 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts 3 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in the side 1 single_crochet in first st that s where you put 2 single_crochet to start join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 30 single_crochet round 4 chain 4 counts as double_crochet+chain 1 throughout 1 double_crochet in same st this counts as your first v st skip 2 sts v st in next st skip 2 sts 9 times join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of chain 4 10 v sts 10 x chain 1 space round 5 slip_stitch in chain 1 space chain 4 1 double_crochet in same space skip 2 sts v st in next st skip 2 sts 9 times join with a slip_stitch to 3rd chain of chain 4 10 v sts 10 x chain 1 space round 6-12 same as round 5 10 v sts 10 x chain 1 space 2 k a m e crochet designs 2025 by krisztina anna edomer all rights reserved round 13 chain 1 1 half_double_crochet in each st and chain 1 space around join with a slip_stitch to first half_double_crochet 30 half_double_crochet round 14 chain 1 1 single_crochet in same st skip 2 sts 7 double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts 1 single_crochet in next st skip 2 sts 7 double_crochet in next st skip 2 sts 4 times join with a slip_stitch to first single_crochet 5 shells 5 single_crochet fasten_off weave in ends chain 70 for drawstring put a knot on both ends weave it in through between the half_double_crochet posts from round 13 fasten_off and weave in all ends thank you for choosing this pattern for your project when you make it i d like to see it please tag me @k a m e_crochet or use hashtag #kamecrochet on instagram or other social media so i can admire your projects you can also join my facebook group where you can get updates on new pattern releases or help with existing ones if you get stuck https //www facebook com/groups/975632939436008/ ref=bookmarks if you have any questions about the pattern you can also contact me directly at kamecrochet@gmail com or youtube https //www youtube crocheting 3
